testimonials.text: I really enjoyed working with Jonathan on the Labs 22 project. He had some keen insights that made the project come together in a delightful way. I was impressed that he could take my 3 paragraph idea and help create www.datadriventransit.org. He would be an asset to any team looking for someone that can take an idea, work with a multi-disciplinary team across the world, and bring it to life.
